solution_line_template: Jim ran {jim_total_miles} / {jim_total_hours} = <<{jim_total_miles}/{jim_total_hours}={jim_miles_per_hour}>>{jim_miles_per_hour} miles for an hour.
Frank ran {frank_total_miles} / {frank_total_hours} = <<{frank_total_miles}/{frank_total_hours}={frank_miles_per_hour}>>{frank_miles_per_hour} miles for an hour.
Frank ran {frank_miles_per_hour} - {jim_miles_per_hour} = <<{frank_miles_per_hour}-{jim_miles_per_hour}={difference_miles_per_hour}>>{difference_miles_per_hour} more miles than Jim in an hour.
